remarks: Any element is less than or equal to a poset's upper bound (if defined).  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
statement:
p0le.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
p0le.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
p0le.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
p0le.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
p0le.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
p0le.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
p0le.d $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom G ) $.
p0le $p |- ( ph -> .0. .<_ X ) $.
